| 0123 4012 | 3401 
| 4012 3401 | 2340 
| 3401 2340 | 1234 
| 2340 1234 | 
| 1234 0123 | 4012

9 muls * 5 lines
8 samples

_______________________________________________________________

| 0123 4--- |
| -012 34-- |
| --01 234- |
| ---0 1234 |
| ---- ---- |

v0 = _mm256_blend_ps(zero, a0, 0b00011111);
v1 = _mm256_blend_ps(zero, b0, 0b00111110);
v2 = _mm256_blend_ps(zero, c0, 0b01111100);
v3 = _mm256_blend_ps(zero, d0, 0b11111000);

| ---- -012 | 34-- ---- |
| ---- --01 | 234- ---- |
| ---- ---0 | 1234 ---- |

| ---- 0123 | 4--- ---- |

a0 = _mm256_blend_ps(zero, a0, 0b11100000);
b0 = _mm256_blend_ps(zero, b0, 0b11000000);
c0 = _mm256_blend_ps(zero, c0, 0b10000000);
e0 = _mm256_blend_ps(zero, e0, 0b11110000);
v0 = _mm256_blend_ps(e1, e0, 0b00000001);
v1 = _mm256_blend_ps(a1, a0, 0b00000011);
v2 = _mm256_blend_ps(b1, b0, 0b00000111);
v3 = _mm256_blend_ps(c1, c0, 0b00001111);

| --01 2340 |
| ---0 1234 |

| 0123 4--- |
| -012 34-- |

v0 = _mm256_blend_ps(zero, d0, 0b11100000);
v1 = _mm256_blend_ps(zero, e0, 0b11000001);
v2 = _mm256_blend_ps(zero, a0, 0b10000011);
v3 = _mm256_blend_ps(zero, b0, 0b00000111);
